scripts.build: npm run fix && npm run build-nofix
scripts.build-apps: npx eslint ./src/apps/code --fix && prettier ./src/apps/code --write && npm run build-apps-postprettier
scripts.build-nofix: npm run clean && npx tsgo && npm run build-apps-postprettier && node -e "console.log(Date.now())" > build/date.txt
scripts.newenv: npm install && git submodule update && npm run build && echo "Open http://localhost:5173 to use Constellation!" && npm run dev
